data: “Thus it came about that, for her child’s sake, the Rani Kurnavati saved herself from the burning pyre and called together the flower of the Rajputs to defend Chitore and their king from the sword of Bahadur Shah.”
The Hermit Doctor of Gaya: A Love Story of Modern India
I. A. R. (Ida Alexa Ross) Wylie
